name: Luminaria
description:
A 2D fantasy platformer developed at Columbia College Chicago.

Move: Arrow Keys

Jump: Space

Interact: Shift

Art Direction: Daria Boudreau

Game Design: Eric Kwon

Animation: Sam Pham

Concept Art: Sam Pham, Jeremiah Green, Daria Boudreau

Programming: Miles Prinzen

Sound Design: Carley Thompson

Additional assets taken from Unity Technologies' Lost Crypt sample project
